ble流程图,实时预览需要装插件，可见仓库中的jpeg
```plantuml
@startuml
<style>
activityDiagram {
  BackgroundColor #33668E
  BorderColor #33668E
  LineColor #33668E
  FontColor white
  FontName arial
  
  diamond {
    BackgroundColor #ccf
    ' LineColor #00FF00
     LineColor #33668E
    FontColor #33668E
    FontName arial
    FontSize 15
  }
  arrow {
    FontName arial
    FontSize 15
    LineColor #33668E
  }
  partition {
    LineColor #33668E
    BorderColor #33668E
    FontColor #00FF00
    RoundCorner 10
    BackgroundColor PeachPuff
  }
  note {
    FontColor Blue
    LineColor Navy
    BackgroundColor #ccf
  }
}
document {
   BackgroundColor transparent
}
</style> 
start
:WIFI_CONF_START;
note right:配网初始化
:ble配网;
->教程、选择家庭wifi并输入密码;
:走入sdk逻辑;
:PROTOCOL_START;
:PROTOCOL_DETAIL;
note right: 配网协议传输详情: ssid/password
:PROTOCOL_DETAIL;
note right: 配网协议传输详情: sendSwitchWiFiSucc
:PROTOCOL_DETAIL;
note right: 配网协议传输详情: sendSsidSucc
:PROTOCOL_DETAIL;
note right: 配网协议传输详情: sendPasswordSucc
:PROTOCOL_SUCCESS;
:BUSINESS_START;
note right: 开始业务流程
:BLE_SEND_TOKEN_START;
:PROTOCOL_DETAIL;
note right:配网协议传输详情: deviceData;
:BLE_SEND_TOKEN_SUCCESS;
:BUSINESS_QUERY_TOKEN_STATE_START;
:BUSINESS_QUERY_TOKEN_STATE_SUCCESS;
:BUSINESS_ADD_DEVICE_START;
:BUSINESS_ADD_DEVICE_SUCCESS;
:BUSINESS_QUERY_TOKEN_STATE_SUCCESS;
:WIFI_CONF_SUCCESS;
end
@enduml
